name: Bee-Man
description:
It's the Bee-Man game ( ﾉ ﾟｰﾟ)ﾉ

Our Bee-Man's hives are scattered all over the place. Help it collect all of the hives in each level and travel to the next level in the bubble!

The levels get increasingly challenging with new mechanics that keep the fun alive!
- Jump over floating blocks over the water!
- Avoid the falling icicles!
- Reverse gravity and walk on the ceiling!
- Fly the Bee-Man around!

Collect all the items in each level to gain all three stars. Can you do that for all levels?

---

Bee-Man is a level based mini-Metroidvania puzzle platformer in which the objective is to collect all the bee hives in each level to be able to advance to the next level. There are also bonus items to collect to achieve a three stars score for each level.
